channel.title: Thunder-scape 742 (need staff)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/295uyc0.png[/img]
Thunder-Scape is a runescape private server dedicated to constant entertainment and player satisfaction. We are mainly based around Player killing aka Pking but we have lots more content for people who don't enjoy pking such as pvm minigames dicing and more! The game is based off the 718 revision of runescape loading 742 cache. We have lots of features for players to try out like...
Fight caves
Fight kiln
Fight pits
Castle wars
Clan wars
God wars
Soul wars
Nomad
Corp beast
Queen black dragon
King black dragon
Nex
and much more!
Come and join the fun!
Note that we are a very new server and there won't be lots of players but i'm sure it will improve in the future
Client download https://www.dropbox.com/s/rl5gft1nrx8n3wx/Thunder-Scape.jar
Media [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img22/7231/d2hn.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img46/8607/yeqv.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img703/9514/bcy0.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img109/6333/vyg.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img23/9850/hs1l.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img839/4249/qn49.png[/img]
